targets.alias: {{term meta.source.hostname.keyword}} -> {{term meta.destination.hostname.keyword}} ({{term pscheduler.tool.keyword}}) - IPv{{term meta.ip_version}}
targets.query: (meta.source.hostname.keyword:$source OR reference.display-set-source.keyword:$source_ref) AND (meta.destination.hostname.keyword:$target OR reference.display-set-dest.keyword:$target_ref) AND test.type.keyword:throughput
